data.title: Big Tech News: Why TWTR, FB and AMZN Stock Are Slumping
data.text: Facebook, Twitter and AMZN stock are all slumping this week after moving to de-platform Trump. Here's what you should know now.

data.title: AMZN Stock: February Put Spread With 32% Return Potential
data.text: The bull put spread in AMZN stock can profit in a wide range, with 32% return potential, as long as Amazon stock remains above 2,900 through Feb. 5. The post AMZN Stock: February Put Spread With 32% Return Potential appeared first on Investor's Business Daily.

data.title: Amazon (AMZN) to Expand in Detroit With New Investments
data.text: Amazon (AMZN) is set to expand in the Detroit area with investments in five new sites and create more than 2,000 permanent jobs therein.

data.title: A Trio of Stock Picks for Growth-Oriented Investors
data.text: The quarterly revenue and net income of the following companies have improved remarkably on a year over year basis, drawing the interest of growth-oriented investors.

data.title: Amazon's ad business will gain the most share this year, according to analyst survey
data.text: Amazon will be the leading share gainer among the major digital ads businesses this year, according to a new ad buyer survey from Cowen.

data.title: Better Buy: Amazon vs. Netflix
data.text: It's hard to find a loser in this battle of digital titans.

data.title: Need to Know: Trump's about to leave DC. That's bad news for these stocks, strategist says
data.text: We're going to be watching less news and digital media and getting out more in the coming years, says our call of the day. It's time to ditch those stocks.

data.title: Parler sues Amazon for withdrawing support after U.S. Capitol riot
data.text: Social network Parler is suing Amazon for pulling its cloud computing support in the wake of the deadly U.S. Capitol riot last week.

data.title: Is Amazon's Stock Undervalued?
data.text: Having grown by 72% since the end of 2019, Amazon's stock still has growth potential in the near term. AMZN's stock grew from $1848 at the end of 2019 to $3183 now, compared to the S&P 500 which gained 18% since the end of 2019.

data.title: Parler sues Amazon for removing the app from its servers
data.text: #Parler #Amazon #ParlersuesAmazon Yahoo Finance's Alexis Christoforous and Jared Blikre discuss Parler going suing Amazon after going dark as a result of being pulled from its servers.
